name: Unconscious (itch)
description:
You are playing as a child in a coma. Everything happens in a small room. The main goal is to make your beloved teddy named Fred to survive for 90 seconds.

There Are three events that vám happen during the game:

- flioor Is lava (her Fred off the ground)

- light (get Fred to the light as Fast as possible)

- seagulls (hide Fred from their poopoo)

Controls: 

A,D, Space, E - grab Fred, 

left mouse button - throw Fred.

This game was created in two days for Ludum dare gamejam on the theme unstable.
